sn46.44:4.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami … pe …
sn46.44:4.2: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn46.44:4.4: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, ‘duppañño eḷamūgo’ti vuccatī”ti?
sn46.44:4.5: “Sattannaṃ kho, bhikkhu, bojjhaṅgānaṃ abhāvitattā abahulīkatattā ‘duppañño eḷamūgo’ti vuccati.
sn46.44:4.9: imesaṃ kho, bhikkhu, sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ abhāvitattā abahulīkatattā ‘duppañño eḷamūgo’ti vuccatī”ti.
